translation.en: [man over PA] Please welcome to the ice our Pinecrest skating pro Katarina Baker.
translation.zh: 请欢迎来自派克雷斯的花样滑冰选手 凯特莲娜·贝克

translation.en: -[man 1] Kill it! -[man 2] Go for gold, Kat!
-[Serena sighing] How are you so awake? -♪ We're all in this together ♪
-[Serena] Is it really that bad? -[Kat] Yeah. [chuckles]
-Did you look in the mirror this morning? -No! [laughs]
translation.zh: 你早上照过镜子吗？ 没有

translation.en: How are my wonderful girls this morning?
translation.zh: 我的宝贝女儿们感觉如何？
索莲娜 你怎么不吃早餐？

translation.en: It's so early. If I eat, I'm gonna puke.
translation.zh: 太早了 如果我吃了会吐的

translation.en: What did Mitch say about getting enough protein?
translation.zh: 米褚不是说要摄取足够的蛋白质吗？

translation.en: And I hope you've been practicing your triple toe like you promised him.
translation.zh: 你答应过他的 希望你有好好练习 后外点冰三周跳

translation.en: Because I overheard Nancy talking to the moms yesterday,
translation.zh: 我昨天无意中听到南希对她妈说

translation.en: and they said you're still wrapping.
translation.zh: 她们说你跳跃的时候还是包腿

translation.en: Look, I know Nancy can be a cunt, but you've gotta stop doing that.
translation.zh: 我知道南希是个贱人 但你别再这样做了

translation.en: Can't hold on to bad habits.

translation.zh: 随便 她女儿是个烂人

translation.en: You know Emily cheats her triple toe. She's fat.
translation.zh: 你知道艾米丽 在后外点冰三周跳时作弊了 她很肥

translation.en: Remember, a flying spin, a spin combo,
translation.zh: 记住 跳接旋转 连续旋转

translation.en: and don't even think about popping your double axel
translation.zh: 还有两周半跳 或是任何一种四次两周跳

translation.en: or a single one of those four double jumps.
translation.zh: 连犯错的想法都不能有

translation.en: I read the rule book, Mom.
Liz isn't gonna be there tonight.
Well, you don't need a coach to hold your hand for an easy test.
translation.zh: 这样简单的测试 你不需要教练手把手教

translation.en: Oh, come on. You'll pass it. If you didn't, it'd be--
translation.zh: 别这样 你会通过的 如果你不能…

translation.en: If I'm gonna coach, I need to pass this test.
translation.zh: 如果我要做教练 我必须通过这个测试

translation.en: And if I'm gonna pass this test, I need Liz there.
translation.zh: 要通过测试 我需要丽思在场

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry, but I just can't afford to pay for both of your coaching anymore.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 但我已经无力支付 你们两个的教练费用

translation.en: Were you wearing that shirt last time I saw you?
translation.zh: 上次见面你也穿着这衣服？

translation.en: Uh, me and my boys went skiing last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚我和孩子们去滑雪了

translation.en: Decided to camp up there so we could get first tracks on the pow this morning.
translation.zh: 我们决定在那边宿营 这样能一早拿到第一条粉滑道

translation.en: That's the whitest shit I ever said.
translation.zh: 那是我说过的最白的废话

translation.en: You bring it out of me.
[Serena] I'm not trying to be mean. I just...
translation.zh: 我也不想说得这么直接

translation.en: Seriously. I'm not kidding. I'm not kidding!
translation.zh: 真的 我不是说笑 不是说笑

translation.en: What the fuck happened to you?

translation.zh: 有才 帅气 多金

translation.en: God, I wish he'd wise up and fuck me.
translation.zh: 他要是聪明点就该操我才对

translation.en: You know Basic Bitch is his third partner in three years?
translation.zh: 那个古板女是他三年内的 第三个搭档了

translation.en: It'll be out with the old, in with the new any day now.
Are you telling me that you want to skate with him?
translation.zh: 你是说你想要和他搭档？

translation.en: I trust no man to throw me five feet in the air going 20 miles an hour.
translation.zh: 我不信任被别的男人 以时速32公里抛高1米5

translation.en: I don't know. I feel sorry for Natalie. -She has to put up with him. -Hm.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我觉得娜塔莉很可惜 要忍受这种人

translation.en: I caught up on a full season of Stranger Things.
translation.zh: 我有机会看完了一整季《怪奇物语》

translation.en: -[woman] I told you guys I was right! -[laughing]
Once that Zamboni's off, I want you stepping on the ice.
translation.zh: 等洗冰车做完 我要你上场

translation.en: How long has Serena been training with him?
translation.zh: 索莲娜跟他一起训练多长时间了？

translation.en: I guess he approached her at that training camp.
translation.zh: 我想他应该是在训练营时 跟她相熟的

translation.en: Mom fired Sharon after coaching Serena for ten years.
translation.zh: 我妈炒掉了莎朗 她教了索莲娜十年
卡萝 那个铁石心肠的疯女人

translation.en: Yup. I'm coachless, and she gets the former Olympian.
translation.zh: 对 我现在没有教练 但她有前奥运冠军

translation.en: Only the best for Idaho's golden child.
translation.zh: 最好的留给爱达荷的金童

translation.en: Serena becomes a senior this summer,
translation.zh: 索莲娜这个夏天就会拿到高级

translation.en: and now I'm coming in second as she's waving on top of the podium.
translation.zh: 我会拿到第二 看着她在领奖台上挥手

translation.en: You're so lucky you don't have to compete against her.
translation.zh: 你很走运 不用和她竞争

translation.en: All I'm focused on right now is passing my senior test.
translation.zh: 我现在一心要通过我的高级组测试

translation.en: Does your sister always pop her jumps like that?
translation.zh: 你姐姐总是那样跳空吗？

translation.en: She usually chickens out at the last second.

translation.zh: 真可惜 她是个漂亮的选手

translation.en: [Kat] What the hell are you doing?
Did you not see me there?
You weren't even gonna try! You never do!
translation.zh: 你都不肯试 你从不肯

translation.en: Just saying, maybe it's time you get out of the way!
translation.zh: 我是说 也许你该别挡路了

translation.en: [man] Holy shit! It went through her foot.
translation.zh: 老天 冰刀穿过了她的脚

translation.en: Get her off the ice right now!
I know. It took the EMT a full minute to get that blade out of her foot.
translation.zh: 我知道 急救人员花了一分钟 才将刀片拔出

translation.en: -She'll be off the ice for months. -Uh!
I mean, that's why I come here every day.
If Emily ever had a fall like that,
translation.zh: 如果艾米丽像那样跌倒

translation.en: at least I could be with her on the way to the hospital.
translation.zh: 至少我能陪在她身边 一起去医院

translation.en: Emily can't jump high enough to get that kind of injury.
translation.zh: 艾米丽跳得不够高 没法伤成这样

translation.en: [Nancy] When I heard what happened, I was sure
translation.zh: 当我听说事情经过 我就肯定又是贾斯丁操作失误

translation.en: it had something to do with Justin acting up again.
translation.zh: 我就肯定又是贾斯丁操作失误

translation.en: -There's a first time for everything. -[all laughing]
translation.zh: 凡事都有第一次 不是吗？

translation.en: You're really coming along on your triple toe, honey.
translation.zh: 你的后外点冰三周跳进步很大 亲

translation.en: Honestly, it's taken a lot of retraining out of some bad habits.
translation.zh: 但老实说 还需要大量的训练 才能改掉坏习惯

translation.en: I'm lucky she's so talented, and I have you to thank for that.
translation.zh: 幸运的是她很有天分 我要感谢你

translation.en: Well, I'm just so happy that you agreed to come teach here.
translation.zh: 很高兴你愿意做她的教练

translation.en: -You're putting us back on the map. -No. Please, you're too kind.
translation.zh: -你让我们有机会出成绩 -别这样说 你客气了
好的 和你聊天很愉快
-是的 -女士们 -迟点见 卡萝 -好的
不错的两周半跳 亲

translation.en: Could be quicker on the landing. You should be watching Serena's axels.
translation.zh: 但可以更快落地 你该看看索莲娜的动作

translation.en: She's always very quick twitch. In, out.
Are you ready for your test?
I could whack her knee with a bat.
translation.zh: 我可以用球棒打她的膝盖

translation.en: You want me to be there tonight?
Better if I'm alone for this one.

translation.zh: 一 二 三 四

translation.en: Jesus! What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 老天 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: You should not be popping such a simple jump as a double lutz.
translation.zh: 你不应该做勾手两周跳 这么简单的动作

translation.en: The story is your coach made you lift your arms on the triple
translation.zh: 你的教练让你在最后第三周时
而且你是个美丽的滑冰选手

translation.en: I hear a rumor that you'd given it up.
You have a very strong upper body, perfect for pair skating.
translation.zh: 你的上半身很强壮 很适合双人滑冰

translation.en: I will help you pass some tests.
translation.zh: 我会帮你通过一些测试

translation.en: Show you how to do throws. Teach you how to jump again.
translation.zh: 教你怎么做抛掷 教你怎么跳跃

translation.en: -You'll be great. -I know how to jump.
translation.zh: -你会变得更好 -我知道怎么跳跃

translation.en: you land all your triple jumps consistently not so long ago.
translation.zh: 你之前的连续三周跳落地都没问题

translation.en: Now you're just a little scared.
[Kat] No one starts pair skating at 21.
translation.zh: 没人在21岁的时候开始双人滑

translation.en: I'm not afraid of a challenge.

translation.zh: 现在没有了 她已经退出

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing here? I thought you were at your test.
translation.zh: 嘿 你怎么在这里？ 我以为你在进行测试

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's just been a while since...
translation.zh: 抱歉 已经有一段时间…

translation.en: You don't have to worry about that anymore.
The next test is in six months, and I can't afford to wait that long.
translation.zh: 下次测试是半年后 我等不了那么久

translation.en: I applied to this fellowship last year in London,
translation.zh: 我去年申请了伦敦的奖学金

translation.en: and it didn't look like it was gonna pan out.
But then I got the news this morning that it's happening.
translation.zh: 但我早上得到消息 应该能成

translation.en: -Wh-- -And I want you to come with me. [laughs]
Come on. You're quitting anyway. This is your chance to just...
translation.zh: 来吧 你反正都要退出了 这是你的机会…

translation.en: Just promise me that you'll think about it.
You know, I can't believe it's all finally over.
translation.zh: 我很难接受一切都要结束了

translation.en: I always thought I'd make my mark, you know?
translation.zh: 我总是以为我会做出点成绩

translation.en: After all the years of training...
I thought I'd see it through to the end.
translation.zh: 我以为我会坚持到最后

translation.en: Did you not hear me? Get up!
She told me I have to do 30 laps around the block if I want to make Worlds.
translation.zh: 她说如果我想有所成就 要绕着街区跑30圈

translation.en: Putting in my notice at the airport tomorrow,
so I can focus full time on Serena's training.
translation.zh: 这样我才能全职帮索莲娜训练

translation.en: And the night shift's just too much.
If I hadn't gotten pregnant with you, I would've gone to the Olympics!
translation.zh: 如果我没有怀上你 我本可以成为奥运冠军

translation.en: There's not a day I don't think about that!
Look! Look at what you're doing to her!
You're gonna take it while I watch.
I think I re-sprained my wrist.
Go inside, put some ice on it,
take a shower, get into bed.
I'll call Dr. Parker in the morning.
translation.zh: 我早上会打电话给帕克医生

translation.en: I'll come back and check on you, okay?
translation.zh: 我回头再来看你 好吗？

translation.en: I've got a lot on my plate.
I put up with these rich-ass people
translation.zh: 我忍受这些有钱人 这样才能存钱买滑雪门票

translation.en: just so I can save up for my lift passes and ski with my boys.
translation.zh: 我忍受这些有钱人 这样才能存钱买滑雪门票 和我的兄弟们一起去
无论在做的事有多么复杂

translation.en: Well, it's about to get a lot less complicated.
translation.zh: 我想事情会变得简单很多

translation.en: And I'm thinking about moving to London with Dave.
translation.zh: 我考虑和戴夫一起搬去伦敦

translation.en: -Hey, kid. -Good to see you too, sir.
translation.zh: -嘿 孩子 -很高兴见到你 先生

translation.en: Looks like the owners are here.
Kat Baker! I heard you were working today. How you doin', sweetheart?
translation.zh: 凯特·贝克 听说你今天上班 你好吗？孩子

translation.en: I'm good, thanks. What can I get you guys?
translation.zh: 我很好 谢谢 你们有什么需要吗？

translation.en: [Reid] Strawberry daiquiri with a lot of rum, please.
translation.zh: 草莓戴吉利 多加点朗姆酒 谢谢

translation.en: Dasha tells me that you may be my son's new partner.
translation.zh: 达莎说你会是我儿子的新搭档

translation.en: Listen, I understand money's a little tight right now,
translation.zh: 听着 我明白你经济不宽裕

translation.en: so I'd like to help you out with that.
Just think, instead of taking drink orders from my guests,
translation.zh: 考虑下 与其帮我的客人下单

translation.en: I'd be paying you to do something you love.
translation.zh: 我付钱给你 让你做你热爱的事

translation.en: Either way, the money's coming from the same place.
translation.zh: 无论哪种方式 你赚的钱都是我这里出去的

translation.en: She's heard you, honey. Let's give her some time to think, maybe.
translation.zh: 她明白你意思 给她点时间考虑吧

translation.en: Listen, I'm not trying to strong-arm you.
It's just, you know, when my late wife first got Justin into figure skating,
translation.zh: 当我已故的太太让贾斯丁 学习花样滑冰的时候

translation.en: I was a little worried he might turn into some kind of a fruitcake.
translation.zh: 我有点担心他会变成同性恋之类的

translation.en: But, you know, she saw something in him, and it turns out she was right.
translation.zh: 但她看到了他的天赋 这得到了证明
我的儿子是奥运冠军的料

translation.en: He just needs a partner now who can match that.
translation.zh: 他只是需要一个同样出色的搭档

translation.en: -I'm suddenly in the mood for champagne. -Ooh!
Bring us a bottle of my good stuff.
translation.zh: 你可以去拿一瓶我的收藏

translation.en: I think we may have gotten through to her.
translation.zh: 我想我们应该说服她了

translation.en: Look, I just wanted to apologize for my husband.
translation.zh: 听着 我想替我丈夫道歉

translation.en: He really is a good person.
translation.zh: 你该知道 他其实是个好人

translation.en: You don't have to. It's fine.
He put you on the spot, and I saw your face,
translation.zh: 他擅作主张帮你安排 我看到你的表情

translation.en: and you looked like you were about to kill him.
If I didn't love that man so much, I'd wanna kill him too.
translation.zh: 如果我不是很爱他 我也会这样

translation.en: Okay, so I know Justin is a goddamn pain in the ass,
translation.zh: 我知道贾斯丁是个大麻烦

translation.en: and I wish him on no woman, but I also know he is the real deal.
translation.zh: 我也希望他不要拈花惹草 但他确实是认真的

translation.en: And that boy has a gift.
Don't worry. I'm not trying to sell you on him again.
translation.zh: 别担心 我不会再说他多好的话

translation.en: And it's not my place to tell you what to do...
translation.zh: 我也没资格教你怎么去做

translation.en: but if you do choose to partner with Justin,
translation.zh: 但如果你选择和贾斯丁搭档

translation.en: just know that you've got an ally in me.
translation.zh: 你有困难可以随时找我

translation.en: All right. I'd better get back in there before James starts to wonder
translation.zh: 好的 我要回去了 不然詹姆斯

translation.en: what's taking me so long in the bathroom. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 会奇怪我去洗手间这么久

translation.en: I had her take a sedative and call into work sick.
translation.zh: 我让她吃了镇定剂 帮她请了病假

translation.en: Why are you suddenly wearing eyeliner?
translation.zh: 你为什么忽然画了眼线？

translation.en: I thought he was gonna tell me to stay home because of my wrist,
translation.zh: 我以为手腕扭伤了 他会让我待在家里

translation.en: but he had me doing off-ice training literally all day long.
translation.zh: 没想到他让我做了整天的场下训练

translation.en: Serena, I don't like the way he acts around you.
translation.zh: 索莲娜 我不喜欢他对你的态度

translation.en: I saw him slap your ass with his gloves the other day.
translation.zh: 我看到他戴着手套 拍了你屁股

translation.en: Oh, my God. It was a joke.
translation.zh: 我的天 那是开玩笑

translation.en: Serena, you really have to be careful about who you trust.
translation.zh: 索莲娜 你要谨慎选择该信任的人

translation.en: Have you ever thought that after
translation.zh: 你有否想过 在我见识了

translation.en: everything that has happened with you and Mom,
translation.zh: 你和妈妈之间发生的所有事后

translation.en: Mitch is the only person in my life I can trust?
translation.zh: 米褚是我唯一可以信任的人

translation.en: I'm just trying to look out for you.
I think you're doing this because you're jealous.
Your Olympic dreams are over, and mine are just beginning.
translation.zh: 你的奥运梦结束了 而我的刚刚开始

translation.en: The best that you could've hoped for was coaching.
translation.zh: 你最好的出路就是执教

translation.en: But now that you've failed your test, you can't even do that.
translation.zh: 但你现在没通过测试 这条路也断了

translation.en: you're trying to screw up my training by attacking Mitch.
translation.zh: 你会攻击米褚来毁掉我的训练

translation.en: Why do you always have to be such a little bitch, Serena?
translation.zh: 你为什么总像个贱人一样？ 索莲娜

translation.en: You are just as messed up and bipolar as she is.
translation.zh: 你就像老妈一样 生活一团糟还有躁郁症

translation.en: I've been able to manage it.
The rink doesn't open till 5:00 a.m.

translation.zh: 有些地方已经5点了 乔治

translation.en: Are you trying to kill an old lady?
translation.zh: 你是打算杀死老妇人吗？
给你 这是我的联系方式

translation.en: For when you change your mind.

translation.zh: 谢谢 但我已经够了

translation.en: You should talk to my sister.
Serena's better than I am. She's the one you want.
translation.zh: 索莲娜比我优秀 她是你要的人

translation.en: in a way your sister never will.

translation.zh: 你有无与伦比的才华 孩子

translation.en: Your only option is to get off that leg and rehab it
translation.zh: 你唯一的选择就是让那条腿休息 并且做复健
三个月后就是地区比赛

translation.en: If you don't rest your hip now,
you're not just gonna have trouble skating.
translation.zh: 就不是不能滑冰这么简单

translation.en: Okay, I'm out. See you later.
translation.zh: 好的 我先走了 迟点见

translation.en: I know I could use a drink.
We're gonna have so much fun!

translation.zh: 你很漂亮 我们要玩得开心

translation.en: -We're gonna have a lot of fun, okay? -Welcome.
translation.zh: 你很漂亮 我们要玩得开心 欢迎

translation.en: [Jenn] That would be great, thank you.
I think I'll need one more.
It'll help numb the pain of knowing you're moving to London.
translation.zh: 这可以舒缓我知道 你要搬去伦敦带来的痛苦

translation.en: Oh, I have something for you.
I found it when I was cleaning the house the other day.
translation.zh: 这是有天我打扫房子时找到的

translation.en: [Kat chuckles] Wow! I can't believe you still have this.
translation.zh: 哇 你竟然还留着这个

translation.en: Remember what we promised each other that summer? [laughs]
translation.zh: 记得那个夏天我们对彼此的承诺？

translation.en: Seems like a reasonable motto when you're nine.
translation.zh: 在你九岁的时候 这个口号很合理

translation.en: -Kat-- -Look, I know what you're trying to do.
I'm not gonna stay, okay? I can't even pass my senior test.
translation.zh: 我不会留下的 我甚至没法通过高级组测试

translation.en: I really don't think you should give it all up.
What opportunity are you talking about exactly?
How the hell do you even know about that?
I know everything that happens at that stupid rink.
translation.zh: 和该死的溜冰场有关的事我都知道

translation.en: I don't understand why everyone suddenly thinks this is a good idea.
translation.zh: 我不理解为什么大家都觉得这是好事

translation.en: Do it for that little girl.
[Justin] Thanks for talking to her for me.
Not sure it's gonna work, but I did my best.
translation.zh: 不确定能不能行 但我尽力了

translation.en: -Oops. -[Mitch] Hey. Kat Baker, are you drunk?
translation.zh: -噢 -嘿 凯特·贝克 你喝醉了吗？

translation.en: She just had a little too much to drink.
If you ever hurt my sister,

translation.zh: 莱西很酷 这是废话

translation.en: You guys wanna go to Jimmy's after this?
translation.zh: 你们之后想去吉米家吗？

translation.en: Maybe stop pretending like you hate me.
translation.zh: 你别装得很讨厌我一样

translation.en: I don't know what game you're playing, but just stop.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在玩什么 但够了

translation.en: I'm not. I just think we'd work well together.
translation.zh: 我没有玩 我觉得我们能合作

translation.en: 'Cause, unlike what everybody thinks, I actually do care about skating.
translation.zh: 因为不像其他人想的那样 我确实在乎滑冰

translation.en: So you had your dad try and buy me?
translation.zh: 所以你让你父亲付钱给我？

translation.en: Do you know how humiliating that was for me?
translation.zh: 你知道这样是羞辱我吗？

translation.en: -It's just how he does things. -[sighs] Great.
And don't tell me you couldn't use the help.
translation.zh: 别说你不需要钱 凯特

translation.en: I will never take a handout from you.
translation.zh: 我绝不会接受你的施舍

translation.en: Help yourselves. It's on my dad.
translation.zh: 你们自便 算在我爸账上

translation.en: Should you really be out on a school night?
translation.zh: 你可以在放学后外出吗？

translation.en: Well, I heard you're a skater.
Isn't this thing kinda frowned upon?
They can't frown upon anything they don't know about.
translation.zh: 他们不知道就无所谓了

translation.en: Just got off the phone with Mitch.
He was telling me that you were drunk and acting inappropriate at some bar.
translation.zh: 他说你喝醉了 在酒吧举止失仪

translation.en: I don't trust him around Serena.
translation.zh: 我不信任他跟着索莲娜
他触摸她的方式 你知道吗？

translation.en: It's an instinct. Something's not right, Mom.
translation.zh: 这是一种直觉 事情不妥

translation.en: Look, I am so sorry that I've put you through all of this lately.
translation.zh: 很抱歉最近让你经历这些事

translation.en: I know my episodes can trigger yours.
translation.zh: 你我都有一样的情绪问题 我会影响到你

translation.en: If you haven't been taking your meds--
You know what I'm talking about.
God, I wish I hadn't told you that.
translation.zh: 天 我真希望我没告诉你

translation.en: we just-- we can't trust ourselves, honey.
translation.zh: 我们无法相互信任 宝贝

translation.en: Every day, I wish you didn't get my brain, but you did.
translation.zh: 每天我都希望你没有得到我的遗传 但事与愿违

translation.en: And so you have to be very careful when you get these "instincts."
translation.zh: 所以你有这些直觉的时候 你要非常小心

translation.en: Well, it's looking a lot like it did last time.
translation.zh: 这看起来就像上次一样

translation.en: You don't get to do this.
I'm gonna go live in London with Dave.
I thought you were gonna pass your senior test?
translation.zh: 我以为你要通过高级组测试

translation.en: You were there. You saw what happened.
translation.zh: 你在场 你看到发生的一切

translation.en: Well, you can take it again in six months.
Why do you suddenly care about me becoming a coach so much?
translation.zh: 你为什么忽然在乎我能否成为教练？

translation.en: Do you seriously think I wanted you to become a coach?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得我想你做教练吗？

translation.en: so that you could put everything that happened to you behind you.
translation.zh: 这样你才能将发生的一切抛在身后

translation.en: Get back on the competition track where you belong.
translation.zh: 回到属于你的比赛场上

translation.en: You and me, Kat, we're the same...
always tripping at the finish line.
God, I wish we had Serena's toughness. I really do.
translation.zh: 天 我真希望我们能像 索莲娜一样坚强

translation.en: I'm not gonna lose three jobs in three years
translation.zh: 我没有三年内被炒掉三次

translation.en: 'cause I keep forgetting to take my meds.
I'm not gonna sleep with losers
who throw me away after one night!
translation.zh: 就将我抛弃的烂人上床

translation.en: I'm not gonna train my children so hard,
translation.zh: 我不会地狱式训练我的孩子

translation.en: my youngest ends up in the emergency room!

translation.zh: 是的 如果我那么可怕

translation.en: then why did I drive you to 5:00 a.m. practice every day for fucking ten years?
translation.zh: 我怎么会十年间风雨不改 每天早上5点送你去训练

translation.en: Why did I fight to get you all the best coaches...
translation.zh: 为什么我为你奋力争取那些好教练

translation.en: and work overtime every chance I could get so that you could have ice time
translation.zh: 我一有机会就加班 这样你才有机会滑冰

translation.en: and pay for your medical bills after your fall?
translation.zh: 还有在你跌倒后帮你付医药费

translation.en: Don't try and make this about me!
translation.zh: 不要说得好像为了我一样

translation.en: This has always been about you!
You just can't stand to let Serena have a turn in the spotlight, can you?
translation.zh: 你就是不能忍受索莲娜 成为众人焦点对吧？

translation.en: Everything I worked for with Kat is garbage, so I threw it away.
translation.zh: 所有我为凯特做的事都是垃圾 我要扔掉它们

translation.en: This is my son. This is the guy I told you about.
translation.zh: 这是我的儿子 这是我跟你说的那家伙

translation.en: Leah just moved here from Seattle,
and she's in the market for a new partner.
her and her family just happen to be staying with us here at the lodge.
translation.zh: 她和家人刚好住在我们这个旅馆

translation.en: ♪ By the time you call my name ♪ ♪ I'm long gone ♪
♪ Ain't finished till the finish line comes ♪
